term.title: congruent transition

item.text: A transition in which the two-phase equilibrium of melting, vaporization or allotropism of a compound involves phases of the same composition.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 577. 'Definitions of terms relating to phase transitions of the solid state (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 579 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466030577)
